content.query:
drop external table externalaggweather
drop table aggweather
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ExternalAggWeather (
	date VARCHAR(100),
    avg_temp_F FLOAT,
    avg_humidity FLOAT,
    avg_wind_speed FLOAT,
    max_temp_F FLOAT,
    min_temp_F FLOAT,
    weather_records INT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'gold/agg_weather/part-00000-45f82f10-2898-48f8-9509-d789d6f5b281-c000.snappy.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
);

CREATE TABLE AggWeather (
	date VARCHAR(100),
    avg_temp_F FLOAT,
    avg_humidity FLOAT,
    avg_wind_speed FLOAT,
    max_temp_F FLOAT,
    min_temp_F FLOAT,
    weather_records INT
);
INSERT INTO AggWeather (
	date,
    avg_temp_F,
    avg_humidity,
    avg_wind_speed,
    max_temp_F,
    min_temp_F,
    weather_records
)
SELECT DISTINCT
	date,
    avg_temp_F,
    avg_humidity,
    avg_wind_speed,
    max_temp_F,
    min_temp_F,
    weather_records
FROM ExternalAggWeather;
GO
